articles.author: Landon Mion
articles.title: Australia announces TikTok ban on federal government devices - Fox Business
articles.description: Australia announced Tuesday that it is banning the Chinese-owned platform TikTok from its federal government’s devices over security concerns.
articles.content:
Australia announced it is banning TikTok from its federal government’s devices over security concerns about the Chinese-owned video-sharing application.
Attorney-General Mark Dreyfus said in a state… [+2431 chars]
